header.title: The best fence installation company in Rocklin
bullets: Design, review and edit your FREE fence quote online using our custom tool.
Ask questions to our friendly, responsive team.
Understand your fence quote with our transparent pricing.
Enjoy your beautiful new fence built by our team of skilled local craftsmen.

Yelp.description: Very pleased with the whole process from the Google Meet video (contact less) for the estimate to the masked installers. Everything came together without a hitch. Sam (project manager) was very helpful with timelines and the installers were adept at improvising with fence design changes. Besides the fences 2 gates had to be installed. One of the gates had to be redesigned because it was originally made on a metal frame. The estimate included 3 versions, lowest cost to most expensive.
Yelp.name: Lon M.
Yelp.title: From the Google Meet video (contactless) for the estimate to the masked installers, everything came together without a hitch.

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor.  In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.
When it’s time to replace your fence, you may be asking yourself what fence style is best for you and your property.
